MGP Ingredients, Inc. has reported the information cited in this GRI content index for the period from January 
1, 2022 to December 31, 2022 with reference to the GRI Standards. The index uses GRI 1: Foundation 2021 and 
corresponds to sustainability  information presented in our annual reports, including our sustainability report, 
proxy statement and annual report, as well as information located on our website.  For a detailed explanation 
of the standards, visit the GRI website. Index
